item.title: E-commerce Customer Churn Analysis & Prediction
item.description: Predicting customer churn and performing customer segmentation for an e-commerce platform

item.title: Remote Work on Mental Health
item.description: How different work environments (onsite, hybrid, and remote) affect employees’ mental health, stress levels, work-life balance, and productivity across various industries.

item.title: Store Opening Toolkit
item.description: A comprehensive toolset for potential business owners looking to open physical stores, leveraging APIs like Google Maps, Yelp Fusion, and OpenAI to generate location-specific recommendations for shop openings.
